variables.name: DOCKER_PASSWORD
variables.desc: Your Docker Hub password (not a personal access token!)

variables.name: DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG
variables.desc: The tag to delete (or a prefix of a tag followed by '*')

variables.name: DOCKER_NAMESPACE
variables.desc: The Docker Hub Namespace to delete the image from (defaults to your username)

variables.name: DELETE_ACROSS_ALL_NAMESPACES
variables.desc: Whether to delete the tag from all the namespaces (if DOCKER_NAMESPACE is not specified)
